<title>Elm.Toolbar.more_item</title>
===== Signature =====

<code>
@property more_item {
    get {
        return: free(Elm.Widget.Item, efl_del);
    }
}
</code>

===== C signature =====

<code c>
Elm_Widget_Item *elm_obj_toolbar_more_item_get(const Eo *obj);
</code>

===== Description =====

%%Get the more item which is auto-generated by toolbar.%%

%%Toolbar generates 'more' item when there is no more space to fit items in and toolbar is in #ELM_TOOLBAR_SHRINK_MENU or #ELM_TOOLBAR_SHRINK_EXPAND mode. The more item can be manipulated by elm_object_item_text_set() and elm_object_item_content_set.%%
{{page>:develop:api:user:class:elm:toolbar:property:more_item:description&nouser&nolink&nodate}}

===== Implemented by =====

  * **Elm.Toolbar.more_item**
